name: Zhang Space Freight
description:
A glorious future awaits humanity among the stars!

This is a gamebook about a glorious future for all humanity among the stars. It's an interactive fiction story. If you like it a lot, please consider buying a t-shirt off of our merch line when it goes live.

Thank you for your time.

Here at the Zhang Space Freight Corporation (the developer of this interactive science fiction experience), we are avid pupils of an old Chinese adage: If you are our fan, we are your fan. Also, do please check out our podcast on Anchor.fm! Thank you!

Additional Notes

Video is the same as for our board game offering. As usual, it's not a game trailer, but it is fun to watch (we guarantee it!). Also, if you are the original artist of the cover image, let us know and we'll link to your current online portfolio at the bottom of this text!

Trigger Warning - this gamebook features quite a bit of profanity.

Caveat Emptor

Your mobile browser needs to be able to support local storage. Brave browser is unacceptable. Use Chrome or Firefox, and boycott the Brave mobile browser, since they support crypto-currencies, which, in case you're not familiar with who uses crypto-money the most, it's literally terrorists, white nationalists, pedophiles, and identity thieves. Don't be an unwitting supporter of trafficking nor criminal behavior. Boycott the 'Brave mobile browser'. It won't work with this game! (I've already tried it. It does NOT work.)
